thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 12 of 1877
thread.title: L J

author: L J
title: L J
text:
Found flights consolidated with airlines normally that do not code share or play together in the industry. Also found additional flight times, airport with overlays not generally listed together elsewhere . Due to this pricing can be an unexpected lower surprise rate.
Billing uncomplicated with no concerns with internet reservations and billing.
Have never needed to utilize the customer service so no comment regarding.
